answerText: Golgi apparatus [10] The Golgi apparatus tags acid hydrolase precursor proteins destined for the lysosome with a label composed of this molecule.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Minnesota A  | 15 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Brefeldin A inhibits transport to this organelle. For 10 points each: [10] Name this organelle which processes and packages proteins inside the cell. It is made up of stacks of structures called the cisternae.
